lead_paragraph: In what seemed to be a new phase of the effort, President Rodrigo Duterte took on judges and police generals, military officials and mayors, among others.

headline.print_headline: President of Philippines Shifts  War Against Drugs to Officials
headline.main: Philippine Leader Shifts Drug War to Officials, Meeting Resistance and Approval

snippet: In what seemed to be a new phase of the effort, President Rodrigo Duterte took on judges and police generals, military officials and mayors, among others....
abstract: Philippine Pres Rodrigo Duterte announces names of more than 150 officials he says are involved in illegal drug trade and orders them to turn themselves in before they are hunted down; Mayor Samsudin Dimaukom of Datu Saudi-Ampatuan is among those targeted officials who deny ever being part of illegal drug trade.
